name: Pokémon Cloud White 2
overview: Description: The scenario starts after the last event of Pokémon Cloud White. Be prepared to discover 3 new regions : South Sinnoh, Sinnoh, and Hoenn. Features: • 3 Regions - Sinnoh, South Sinnoh, and Sevii • 35 h of Scenario • All the Pokémons (gen 1 to 7 + some fakes mega evolutions) • All the Primal reversion and Mega Evolutions • Day & Night system • BW Repel System • 6th Gen exp.catch system • New Battle Backgrounds • New Battle Boxes • New trainer sprites • Dollsteak patch • Berry & Honey trees • Cuztomizable House etc.
